title: AI scribes may reduce documentation time and improve physician well-being
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) tools designed to automatically document patient visits show promise in reducing the time physicians spend on paperwork and may improve their work experience, according to a new randomized clinical trial conducted at UCLA Health.

title: Central Banks Using AI For Low-Risk Processes, Wary Of Cybersecurity
description: A small survey of central banks across the world has revealed most are experimenting with artificial intelligence only in low-risk processes, even as they remain cautious about cybersecurity risks. Most institutions are experimenting with AI only in low-risk processes like scanning market news, flagging anomalies and summarising reports.
content:
A small survey of central banks across the world has revealed most are experimenting with artificial intelligence only in low-risk processes, even as they remain cautious about cybersecurity risks.

title: Wall Street Maintains Bullish Emerging-Markets Outlook for 2026
description: Major Wall Street banks are gearing up for another strong year in emerging markets, predicting that dollar weakness and the investment explosion in artificial intelligence will offer a further boost to the asset class.

title: Microsoft Ireland has cut 250 jobs since last summer
description: Country head says artificial intelligence and digital skilling in the economy critical to making sure Ireland is competitive on global level
content:
Microsoft cut about 250 jobs in Ireland as part of cost control measures announced in July, but the company hopes to grow its headcount here again in the coming years, the company’s site leader in Ireland has said.
